positive_examples: This is an example of shapley game.
The shapley game demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed shapley game in this context.
A typical case of shapley game would involve these features.
The concept of shapley game applies here.
A cooperative game where payoffs are distributed according to each player's marginal contribution using the Shapley value.
negative_examples: This is an example of evolutionary game, not shapley game.
This represents cooperative game in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvolutionaryGame, or other types of CooperativeGame

definition: A cooperative game analyzed using Shapley value for fair surplus distribution.
